description: This file defines data models and a repository for managing Recipe objects in a Kotlin-based project. It includes a data class 'Recipe' and a class 'RecipeRepository' providing CRUD operations and seeded sample data.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Data model representing a recipe, including fields for id, title, description, ingredients, steps, and an optional image URL.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: An in-memory repository supporting CRUD operations for Recipe objects, with methods to create, retrieve, update, delete, and seed sample recipes.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.getAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all recipes stored in the repository.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.getById
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its unique identifier.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.create
methods.description: Adds a new recipe to the repository, assigning a new UUID if the provided recipe has a blank id.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.update
methods.description: Updates an existing recipe; returns true if successful, false otherwise.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.delete
methods.description: Removes a recipe by id; returns true if a recipe was removed.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.Companion.newId
methods.description: Generates a new UUID string for recipe identification.

methods.name: RecipeRepository.Companion.withSeed
methods.description: Creates a new repository instance seeded with two sample recipes.
